DOC.brief_summary: The investigators here propose to evaluate the hormonal and metabolic effects of weight loss, including evaluation of changes in several tissues.
DOC.brief_title: Hormonal and Metabolic Effects of Weight Loss
DOC.criteria: BMI > 27 kg/m2 (adults) pregnancy, breastfeeding patients with: heart failure impaired hepatic or renal function anaemia disturbed coagulation infection, malabsorption severe hypertension any other endocrine disorder
